attributes.action: allow sufficient nuclear power stations to be built to initiate a hydrogen production industry ,producing liquid fuel for transport .
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: inevitable that hydro-carbon fuel will become scarce and expensive.Biomass systems will drive up the price of food due to competition for land  and are inefficient .Generation of hydrogen is only way forward.Such a industry will safeguard future transport systems.
